concept.title: AppMeasurement for PHP
concept.shortdesc: The Adobe Measurement Library (PHP) Integration Guide describes using the Measurement Library (PHP) to measure the usage of your website.

conbody.p: It lets you capture certain types of activity on your website, and forward that data to Adobe data collection servers.
This guide is intended for Web developers, and assumes that you are familiar with both implementing Analytics data collection code, and PHP Web development.

section.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
section.p: This document and the related software described in this document is proprietary to Adobe Systems, Inc. and is supplied only under license or nondisclosure agreement. The document and software can be used or copied only in accordance with the terms of the agreement. See Enterprise Terms of Use.
The information in this document is subject to change without notice and does not represent a commitment on the part of Adobe.

section.title: Account Support
section.p:
ClientCare is available to:
Answer specific product questions.
Help you utilize Analytics reports to the greatest effect.
Resolve any technical difficulties you might have.
Help you configure Analytics variables.

section.title: Service and Billing Information
section.p: Depending on the service level you have purchased, some of the options described in this guide might not be available to you. Additionally, each account has unique billing needs. Please refer to your contract for pricing, due dates, terms and conditions. If you would like to add to or otherwise change your service level, or if you have questions regarding your current service, please contact your Account Manager.
Adobe welcomes any suggestions or feedback you might have regarding AppMeasurement for Flash or the contents of this guide. Send comments to your Account Manager.
